content: I was on The Surreal Life cuddling with Jordan knight.

I was dying of uterine cancer (does that even exist?) then I dreamed I was being chased by an evil 12 year old that wanted to cut my achilles tendons. (don't laugh!! it was scary!) I went to the afterlife, too.... through the forest.

I had two kids, but I had also given birth to a puppy and was now, I found, pregnant with a scorpion. This grossed me out, the thought that I was pregnant with a scorpion. I remember feeling like "Why did this have to happen to me again??" I was in a pavilion with some people from high school, I think like Alyssa Engle and Catherine Menard and Kelly Haas. I was with big Keith but he seemed like he was an ex-boyfriend, Shawn, I think.
There was another part where I was in NYC and somehow George Carlin was involved and I was going to Wendy's. And there was a picnic table outside with three dead stuffed animals on it. It was some sort of trick and I went to a parking garage to tell Tim Ignaffo about it.

I was in school and I was waiting for Sandy to have her baby. She was going to call me when she went into labor. So I was taking a Chinese cooking class to pass the time, and we were sitting at these long cafeteria tables. The teacher put something in the oven and then one of the students said that there was a finished one already in there (like on cooking shows on TV) but then the oven started making weird noises and everyone was like WTF? But I ran out the door and ducked as the oven exploded. Keith's dad was in the hallway and I said something like, "I heard the oven making weird noises and I was like get the fuck out of there!" and his dad chuckled.
Then I went back to my dorm room, where some boy was living for some reason. Like he had been crashing there and I didn't notice. But he was really dirty and his breath stunk because he had been laying in my bed for days and hadn't brushed his teeth. He told me he had written some poetry or something on my computer and showed it to me. I wasn't sure what I thought about it, like I remember thinking it was pretty good but a little juvenile, like he had promise.
Then Sandy called and said that she had been in labor for "the equivalent of two days" and asked me to come down. So I left (little Keith and Ciara existed but I don't know where they were.) Big Keith came with me, and we went to a park, because for some reason Sandy was giving birth in a park. At first I thought the park was really crowded, but then all I saw was two burly Mexican men with mustaches sitting in ornately carved wooden chairs with high backs in the middle of a field. I was telling Keith that Sandy's sister had been up for the birth but had to leave to go to Australia. Sandy had been afraid that Jenn, the doula, would leave for Australia as well before the baby was born. Jenn reassured her that she wouldn't go to "Eurasia" before the baby came. (Yeah I know Australia isn't Eurasia.)
As we walked through the park, I realized it wasn't the right park. Sandy hadn't told me *which* park, I just assumed that was the one. We came upon an outdoor bazaar with tents selling mostly artifacts from Tibet-- statues of Buddha, prayer flags, etc. I think the dream ended with me trying to figure out what park Sandy was in.
a naked ex-boyfriend, a swamp, and syrenichol locked in a room and forced to lie under flannel blankets while she cried to get out.

Dream partially based on Jack Chick tracts. It was the apocalypse and the black plague had been revived in Europe. Big Keith and I were in Canada with the kids and I wanted to stock up on food so we could shut ourselves up and not contract it. (I love Herman Hesse... but anyway...) Nunavut and the government of Nunavut had something to do with this. I think I wanted to go there because it is isolated. I was also wearing a Sailor Moon crown thing and big Keith was like "You know that is a sign of Baphomet, right?" and I was like oh shit I'm going to Hell! And also I guess stockpiling food was forbidden by God because we were supposed to just trust him and so I was trying to find a loophole so I could stockpile food in case it wasn't really the apocalypse. Then Big Keith was taking some kind of hallucinogenic drug and I was really mad at him and stormed out onto a porch and there were other people there and started panicking, like how you panic when you realize you are doing something really dangerous mindlessly in a dream. I thought maybe they had the plague. Also in my dream, San Francisco was an island and covered in water, but not deep water, like just a foot or so of really warm water, but it was out in the ocean. And I said to my mom, who is a Californian originally, "I didn't know San Francisco was an island," and she started acting like I was really stupid. "It's just a *different color island*," she told me. I looked at the map, and, sure enough, it was pink while the rest of California was yellow.

I was talking to Jim on AIM for some reason, and I told him that I missed Scott (with a little frowny emoticon) and he made some bullshitty comment trying to be nice but basically saying that Scott didn't want to talk to me ever again. And then I went to the movies with Jim, Shaun McCavara and Matthias and it was really weird and awkward.

I was being shown my greatest "sin," not a sin in the usual sense... not murder or greed or envy, but a sin in the sense that perpetuating it would lead to my lonliness and unhappiness. It was my belief that others are not human in the way I am, that they don't have insecurities and that everything they do is calculated and purposeful. It is true that this has caused me a lot of mental anguish. I don't call people a lot of times because I am afraid to be rejected. When another person doesn't call, I assume it is intentional, that they do it because they view me as inferior and don't want to pursue a friendship with me. So chances at friendships slip through my fingers as I view each missed opportunity as a personal insult. I invited Masae and her kids to Keith's bday party in December, but haven't called her since. She hasn't called either. I, because I am afraid of being rejected and her, I assumed, because she decided she didn't like me. But I think I should give her the benefit of the doubt. Maybe she feels the same way. Maybe she is insecure, too, or maybe she thinks that I dislike her for some reason, because she's older, because I am insecure about my Japanese speaking ability, etc.

I tried to go back to Mt Holyoke and I had a bag from UAlbany and a former classmate (Emily) assumed it was from Yale for some reason (like I had left Mt Holyoke to go to Yale) but then I had to tell her it was from UAlbany. And then she said something like, that nobody wanted to room with me (I'm sure you understand!) but they would try to find a single.

I was on the (from Lost) island...I lost Chloe and couldn't find her. met with the ghost of mr. Eko (who is not dead as far as i know on the show, but anyway...) charlie was living in a tree. everybody had been going to what they thought was an abandoned house to go pee and shower and stuff, but then a rich guy came in a boat and it was his house. and when he came, it didn't look abandoned anymore...like there was laundry out folded and waiting to be put away and stuff. He was really cocky and obnoxious and wouldn't help us get off the island. then he had sex with some girl who i knew was an adult but then he was like drawing a picture of her on a roll of paper above his bed, and there were drawings of other women he had had sex with, but in the picture she looked like a little girl and i wondered whether to tell somebody that he was a pedophile or something. Then I left and found all of these buildings, looked like a college campus, and all these people walking around, and I asked a girl what the buildings were and she said that two of them were churches, one for kinda mainline protestants and one for people who liked to holler "amen!" and such during service. I was trying to decide which one to go to.

i dreamed that i worked in a library and somebody had requested through interlibrary loan a front 242 cd, but for some reason they just listed it as "242" and i couldn't find it. La_veuve_chibi (somebody I knew from Livejournal) was there and expressed shock that the mid-hudson library system had front 242 cds.

I was looking at the place I would be buried, and it was all underwater. There were big fish and sea monster type creatures swimming around the graves, I thought in the dream because they liked to munch on the corpses. They made disgusting, ugly noises. Big Keith kept getting too close and almost falling in, and every time I tried to pull him back, he laughed at me for overreacting.

I told Mr Briggs i wanted to be an english teacher like him and he said that being an english teacher was stupid...not what he wanted to do. he wanted to be a backup dancer for j.lo.
in the dream i had last night, mr. briggs told me he decided to take back my high school diploma because i didn't deserve it. i didn't deserve any recognition for any academic achievements because i had kids too young and was obviously an idiot.

I have a recurring dream where I go to Kanazawa on a whim and forget to bring my host family's address and therefore cannot go visit them. It is really stressful. Then, in the dream, I often start freaking out about that 17 hr plane ride home. what if the plane crashes? And I start freaking out. And then I'm like, wait, didn't I ride here on the plane? Why don't I have any recollection of it? It is weird.

I had another baby, a girl. She was taken out of me somehow without my consent or knowledge. Like I think I was busy, on a vacation or something and somehow she was removed remotely. Anyway, I named her Maggy.
I became a Mormon. Then I looked up Jeremy Brooks (in my dream) on myspace to tell him because he is the only real-life Mormon I have ever known.

I went to the mall without the kids to do some shopping even though I felt uneasy about it for some reason. While I was there, there was some sort of attack or something and I pushed some button because I thought it would make it better, but it actually activated a bomb and the whole mall blew up. I was running from the fireball Hollywood-style and thinking as I ran that I should steal stuff during this crisis because that's what people do in events like this, right? They loot? I remember thinking of Hurricane katrina and I kept trying to take things as I ran--candy mostly but I kept putting it back because I felt bad about stealing.
Anyway I got out (and btw this took place in the "mall" but it's like "the mall" that is always in my dreams, not like the mall that is in real life.) and I usually walked home from the mall but in my dream I was standing with a couple other girls and they were going to take the bus, so I did too, even though I had a bad feeling about that, too. We got on and there was this guy standing in the front who was trying to be a tour guide or something but I could tell he was unstable. As I was thinking that I should get off at the next stop, he pulled out a gun and started shooting people. He hit me in my right ear twice and I fell.... tried to play dead basically and this guy in front of me covered me with something so the shooter wouldn't see me. For some reason he wanted to make sure that I specifically was dead and everybody kept telling him yes, I was. Then he (the shooter) was like "did i really do that?" and they stopped the bus and everybody got out. I had to run to a house nearby and I was hoping he wouldn't see me and realize I wasn't dead... I went into the house looking for help and there was a doctor there, and he kept saying there was no way I'd live, but I realized after a while that it was bullshit. I was fine. He stitched up my head (which like had this huge gash in it and he had to like, reattach parts of my skull... weird but whatever)...

I was telling big Keith that I really, really wanted to see Cloverfield this weekend. He was like "Oh, I already watched it on the internet. It was OK." And I was all pissed, like "I've been looking forward to seeing this movie for months and you watched it on the internet!!" I felt really betrayed that he saw it online instead of going to see it in the theater w/ me.

Some unknown group was dropping bombs on the entire country, including Poughkeepsie. The bombs first caused fires. Then the fires turned into churches (fake ones, like from a movie set or something.) Then the churches turned to water.

Katie Holmes was staying with big Keith's parents and they lived in Amanda's old house (I dream about that house a lot). THey were unaware that she was famous. She was sick and talking on the phone to Tom Cruise about how her "recovery" was going... like she had come to the Hudson Valley to recover or something.
The other night I dreamed I was at a party with Paris Hilton, Nicky Hilton, Nicole Ritchie and like, Lindsay Lohan and they were all making fun of me because I was so unstylish.
I was eating dinner rolls with Ben Linus (from Lost)

Sandy was somehow acquainted with Keiths friend Ruy, and she was thinking about moving to a place near Poughkeepsie but knew that if she were that close to Ruy, she would fall in love with him. And in my dream I was telling Keith about it and he was like “Ruy is a young guy who likes to party and stuff. He wouldn’t want to be with an older woman with four kids.” We were all at a lake or something and Sandy had bleached some of her hair and I remember thinking that it looked really good.

A person who was a cross between Poet (from Oz) and somebody else (can't put my finger on who) wrote a book and wanted me to read it, but i left it outside and it got rained on and molded and eventually disintegrated, but there was like, a seed in the book that grew into a tree. I dug it up and i think i took it to plant somewhere else.

Lindsay was in it and she had flown in from oregon. Almost immediately after she got off the plane, I convinced her that we should fly to Detroit together. We got on another plane. I had one suitcase. there was nothing to do on this plane--no movies, music. nothing. not even any food. I was kicking myself for not bringing a book or anything but told myself it would be a short flight, anyway.
The plane experienced some sort of malfunction early in the flight and wasn't able to get off the ground. we all got off. There were tables with cold cuts and cakes and stuff. Ciara was there all of a sudden and wanted a treat but I couldn't find anything that wasn't ridiculously expensive. $8 for a brownie, stuff like that. The ladies selling the stuff were looking at me nastily.
Then there was a separate part where I was at the mall with Matthias and we went to a store in the place where earth traders used to be but it was like, a bath and body works? but there was nothing in it. it was going out of business i guess, and i realized this as i walked in. Amanda Corbett was there working and she was really surprised to see me there with him and I was all embarrassed to have her see me at all.

i was driving a car but the seat was too far down and i was reaching way up to reach the steering wheel. i was like, peering out the side window trying to see ahead because i wasn't tall enough to see out of the windshield. i tried to adjust the seat to make it higher, but to no avail. inevitably, i got into an accident, the car rolling over several times. i remember that once it had happened, i mostly felt relief that it was over.

i was at a party at somebody's house and there were TONS of people there. it was winter and 30 degrees out (i remember checking the temperature.) a lot of people were in the house and i was in there at first talking. renee bridle was there and she was wiping some sort of cream in my hair. matt tewey was there, too, and he was characteristically surly and smoking pot. he looked at me disapprovingly. i wandered from room to room. amanda was there, laying on the floor. the place was packed. i went outside. there were bonfires everywhere, like three or four of them with groups of people around each one, talking. there were two pools filled with people swimming (and yeah it was still really cold.) i got the sense that there were different groups, different choices. some were grouped around the fires, some around picnic tables, some in the pools, etc. i found ciara and chloe who were wearing each other's coats and i got them mixed up. i took them with me as i tried to decide on a group, a choice. i couldn't decide. people were roasting marshmallows now and it was getting dark, so i chose a table and sat at it but i was dissatisfied with it. i kept wondering if it would have been better if i had picked a different group. the people at the table were ugly and boring and i didn't want to stay there. i eventually got the sense though that my dissatisfaction/grass-is-greener mentality was bullshit, that no matter what choice i made, there would be pros and cons that i would deal with. i just had to make the damn choice.

Lindsay was having a party at her parents' house and she invited all these people from high school and stuff. The only one I remember explicitly is Mike Perkins. Anyway she didn't invite me! I had to go over there for some other reason though and it was really awkward and I felt awful and rejected. Everybody pretty much ignored me. Then when I was going to leave, I took what I thought was my cellphone but realized it was actually Lindsay's when it started blowing up with calls. I was like oh this isn't my phone. If it were my phone, nobody would be calling me. So I had to bring it back to her and get my phone. When I was leaving, her father was outside with like a big wooden crate (like the kind they have pumpkins and stuff in at the grocery store or whatever) and it was filled with like, Styrofoam halloween decorations that he got on sale and was going to give to people as gifts. They were sparkly.

I was playing Super Nintendo with Dimitri and Gregg. Then I went into a room that Dimitri had gone into, and all these girls scattered. He seemed happy to see me but I was upset for some reason and crying and grabbed a towel to wipe my face. I noticed that it smelled like vagina and asked him if it had "gross stuff" on it. He said yes. He had been like, giving the other girls head on the towel hahaha. I was really embarrassed in the dream, obviously.
Anthony Hopkins was in a superhero suit, sitting at the table of the Last Supper with two unconscious women with their faces in bowls of soup.

last night, i dreamed that i was going to the movies with a bunch of friends. Before the movie started, we were all getting food, but it was like mcdonalds, not like a movie theater concession stand. i ordered a "meal" and then realized that i didn't need it because i already had a soda cup that got free refills (so i didn't need the drink that went with the meal). so i ordered a cheeseburger with no onions and a large fry. The girl working there seemed to know me. Some guy came up and started talking to me and asking what movie I was seeing (in the dream, I thought he was hitting on me). I told him I wasn't sure, but I thought my friends and I were seeing some movie that we'd seen already.... i can't remember what movie i said but as i was saying it, i realized that that couldn't be the one i was seeing, because it was already out on dvd.
I knew I was late, so I ran down the hallway. Chloe was with me, sort of, and we went past a lot of normal theater doors to get to our theater at the end. It looked like the wooden doors to a college lecture hall and there was a sign on the doors that said something like "regular theater". This was meant to distinguish it from the other theaters, which were presumably special in some way. Chloe and I went in. she promptly ran off and disappeared somewhere.
The lights were on all the way. there were seats all along the side of the room by the windows (yeah, there were windows.) It basically just looked like a college classroom. There were no seats in the middle. all my friends were, for the most part, crowded along the wall, uncomfortably close to one another. I wanted to sit next to Chris, but somebody was next to him, so I looked to the back of the room, which was significantly less crowded. in the very back was a couch, where evan and dimitri were sitting. they were sitting really close to one another but there was room on the other side of dimitri, so i sat down next to him and spread all my food out. (I lost my fries during the movie.)
the lights went down and the movie started i guess but i don't remember anything about the actual movie. in the dark, dimitri started getting cuddly. In my dream, I told myself it was because he knew Evan and I had "broken up''. He had his head on my shoulder. He had long hair apparently and I noticed this when he took it out of a ponytail. It was bleach blonde. I touched it and it felt like straw. He shrugged his shoulders. After a while, I got up for some reason, and i saw that evan had curled up into a ball on the couch and was clearly really upset, i assumed it was because of me and dimitri. I talked to him, trying to coax him out of his funk.
I don't remember what happened because then all of a sudden we weren't watching a movie anymore, but were in some room that apparently belonged to big Keith. there was a full-length mirror in it, and I was confused about whether it was mine or his. somehow it ended up breaking and my friends and i vacuumed up the pieces. Then we left.
out in the parking lot, everyone's cars were crammed into what looked like large bookshelves. for some reason everyone had disappeared and i wasn't sure where they went, so i checked the car bookshelves to see if i recognized anybody's cars. I didn't at first, but eventually found Dimitri's red car, facing away from me, so I knew they were still there somewhere.
Keith called on the cellphone and started yelling at me for breaking the mirror. i asked him what had happened to my headphones for my ipod, and he told me that he had taken them as payment for all the things i'd broken. I was livid.
I still couldn't find my friends, and ended up wandering down the streets of one of these dream towns I have.... found my mom somehow and brought her to a pub that had a door leading to a spiral staircase. on the door, it said something about a vampire in the tower. I asked my mom if she'd ever seen the vampire and she said no. i was like, oh you have to see it, it's pretty cool. so we went in the door, climbed the staircase, and it led into a very small attic space. I was ahead of my mom and felt something brush against my leg, freaked out and climbed down.

one of the cooks at work came in after being gone for a while and like, lay down on me and we hugged really intimately. Everybody was watching. It was really, really awkward and in it, the other waitresses were all disgusted that I would allow him to do that. Apparently he tried to with everyone.

we (Chris Daley and I) were hugging or something or he had his arm around me, basically being mushy like we are at parties and such, and then he like, stealthily tried to kiss me, like he tried to make it seem like he wasn't? just in case i rejected him? I turned my head because i didn't want to get involved in more boy craziness on top of all of the shit I've brought on myself recently... I remember thinking that I hoped he wasn't offended, and I wanted to tell him in the dream that it really didn't have to do with him, it was because I was already so embroiled in romantic drama and whatever. I couldn't tell him though because then he'd know I knew he had tried to kiss me. In the dream, I was very scared that he would stop being friends with me. :/

some of my friends and I decided to go see a movie, and it was in this theater that has been in my dreams before but that I've never (to my knowledge) seen in real life. It has like, stadium seating but there aren't individual movie theater seats, there are like upholstered benches. In this dream in particular this theater was the New Paltz theater and as we walked in, I told Dimitri that I disliked that theater because of the seats. (He is the only person there I remember, though there were other friends there, maybe two or three others.)

it involved the fair, and chris daley.... i was going to chris's house but it was in the city of poughkeepsie and heather gave me directions and while i was driving, i was thinking about how good her directions were. i was really satisfied with how she told me to get there. when i got there, i parked and then just totally switched gears and was going to a sort of community center that had activities for kids in it and i was like, checking them out to see if my kids would like it. i was impressed and was talking to some little kids there, telling them i would bring my kids one day. there were large slides in several of the rooms.
there was another part that i think had to do with the fair. chris and van mcgrogan and i were standing in a field and i think it was the fair but it was practically abandoned. van was showing us photos on his phone or camera... there was no animosity that i recall between the two, as there is in real life.

my brother had a cable-access TV show that was supposed to be an adult version of Mr Roger's Neighborhood. He was wearing mirrored aviator glasses and had feathered 80s hair and was teaching the viewers how to shave themselves with a straight razor. He had a cut on his chin where he had presumably nicked himself before, and avoided that spot as he shaved. In the dream, my mom was watching the show with me and said "It feels really good when he lathers your face up".

I went into work and whoever I was meant to work with wasn't there. It was just me. I don't even know if there was a cook there. no customers came, either. i hadn't dressed correctly.... we are supposed to wear all black, but i had either worn white pants or a white shirt, i forget which. no customers came for a couple hours, then one of our regulars, an older woman with curly brown hair, came in. She asked for something really weird and complicated, like for her drink she wanted a cafe mocha, which I guess in theory wouldn't be that hard to accomplish.... I could probably have just put chocolate syrup in coffee, but for some reason I was really confused and she started telling me in detail exactly what I had to do, how much coffee, how much milk, how much chocolate. then she wanted like, a greek salad and maybe a quesadilla or something? something else that people order a lot. then all these people started flooding in. tons of them. I couldn't keep up. I was freaking out, not sure how I'd get to everyone, then these asian women came in and I realized that Bob had hired them to run the diner. a few of them were cooks and went in and started frying shit. Then other waitresses started coming in, but they weren't people I knew. they were like, these really super skinny big-boobed blonde girls, really typical American beauty standards. I got the impression that Bob had hired them because he thought having really traditionally attractive women working there would increase business. I started worrying that he would fire me because I didn't look like that. I was still really confused, not sure which tables were mine and to top it off, the people I had been serving had changed tables several times. then i noticed that i hadn't even put in that woman's order yet, and had in fact not even gotten her drink. I went to make the cafe mocha but got confused and put chili in a bowl and then started adding coffee. Eventually she came over and was like, wtf are you doing? and wanted me to just give it to her the way it was and I refused. i was like, well i'll get it to you in a minute, and started trying to pour it in a coffee cup, then added some whipped cream. brought her her drink, and she was sitting there talking to what i assumed was a friend she had randomly run into, a 20-something asian woman who was coloring in a coloring book as they talked.
i went to put her order in, and how we did it was that there were like, rows of slick-looking computers on long desks, like we were in a college computer lab. They were touch-screen, like we really do have at work, but the options on the screen looked like they had been hand-written. I struggled with the new interface, trying to figure out where things were located. I also had trouble reading my own handwriting, and there was something I had written on the bottom of my pad that I couldn't read. I decided to just put in what I had and whatever I forgot, she'd remind me of when I brought the food.

Mike Perkins was having a barbeque in some park. i got there early and all of the other people who were there already had driven in red pickup trucks in various states of disarray. I went into some sort of pavilion and Mike had set up the grill and had a big cooler full of meat that various people had brought. "I have turkey burgers and turkey dogs" I said and threw them in the cooler. but the "turkey dogs" looked more like pepperoni so i told him that, and mike said "ooh! I'd like to try those later!"
Thomm quackenbush was involved in this dream somehow. He had really really long scraggly hair and somebody had recognized him in a photo or something.

I was back in high school and we went on a field trip to disney world. there was some guy there that Lindsay was interested in but who had rebuffed her advances. We were about to leave for home but I wanted to get food before we left, so I went to a pizza place and Rich Contini was working there. We were bullshitting a bit and I ordered two pieces of pepperoni pizza. There was a little asian girl working with him and she was giving me a hard time. i had a considerable amount of difficulty figuring out how to give her the right amount of money, and then left without my pizza and went back to rejoin the group.
We were all sitting on a dock watching boats go by. Apparently the boats were rides. Pirates of the Caribbean went by and then another boat that looked like a pirate ship but was actually a ride for something that had nothing to do with pirates. it was based on a movie but I forgot which movie. anyway i was showing people photos from my camera and they were being projected on a screen somehow and as i showed them the pictures, i realized that they were videos. I remember thinking that it was pretty cool that I had taken these old pictures in video format. one was apparently from a trip to the zoo that I went on with Lindsay and in it, a monkey had a pizza and it was stolen by an elephant. I recounted the event to the group. Everyone was laughing. Then I found another "picture" but that one was boring. i flipped to the next one "if it doesn't have monkeys with pizzas in it, i'm not interested!" I said. The guy Lindsay was interested in was sitting next to me and hitting on me and I was really getting uncomfortable. Then I saw Crystal Niet walking across the water and I was like, holy shit she's jesus! And then I saw that she was walking on a section of the pier that was partially underwater. The guy was still hitting on me (his name was 'jon jon' apparently) and he even tried to kiss me, but I stopped him. When we got up, I said something about his advances and that I wasn't comfortable with him hitting on me since my friend was interested in him. He denied trying to kiss me.
Then we all got on a train to go back. I was walking back and back and back into the train and then realized that I had forgotten a bag in Disney World somewhere. I searched frantically for it and then when I couldn't find it, started freaking out because my ipod and camera were in the bag.
Then I was back at my parents' house talking to my mom freaking out over the lost bag. my mom was like, you know it's no big deal! it's just stuff! I was ripping up papers and I smashed a glass candle holder. "at least your friends got back safe.." she said. "I don't give a shit about them!" I yelled. "I'd let them all die if it meant I could have my camera and ipod back! I've lost EVERYTHING!!!!' My mom tsk tsked at me, and that's when I woke up.

i went to this massive museum. the inside was really pristine and white, and there were giant staircases leading to different floors. the main part was very open, but there were hallways and stuff coming off of it. i got the feeling that it wasn't just used as a museum. part of it had shops in it and part had classrooms (for arlington students i guess?)
Anyway, a big group of us went to the museum. There were like 20 people, but the only ones I remember specifically are Mike Perkins, Keith Travis, Robbie Bear and Chris. We ended up getting separated almost immediately and I wandered the museum alone, eventually stumbling upon some sort of water exhibit. you would walk through a maze-like set of partitions and water squirted from different types of nozzles and there was some sort of explanation posted on plaques on the walls. I was walking through it and I came upon what looked like a dead body laying under one of the partitions, just the foot sticking out. The plaque above it detailed some sort of water-related death, and I guess it was supposed to just be a mannequin but somehow I realized that it was an actual person, and I thought they had died in the exhibit. I ran out and, after getting lost in some OTHER exhibit that involved monkeys in little cars. I found a girl that worked at the museum. I breathlessly told her that I had found a dead body in the water exhibit. "oh," she laughed. "that's just robbie bear! he volunteered to be the body in the exhibit!" i went back and sure enough, it was robbie bear. i marveled that both the girl and i knew robbie bear, but she didn't seem to care.
Robbie Bear and I set off to find the other members of our group, but he ran really fast ahead of me and I got left behind. Part of my search involved SLIDING down these massive stairs because if I tried to walk, I would fall. FINALLY i came across mike, keith travis and a couple really ugly guys. i ran up and hugged Mike gratefully (and he didn't grumble at me!) and was like omg thank god i found you! i was all alone and robbie bear ran away from me and...andd....!!! and mike was like, it's ok we're leaving now. I asked where Chris was and Mike misunderstood me and thought I was asking where Chris was going after the museum, and he said that he was going to be "in a hot tub up the road" with his parents and two girls. He said that both he (mike) and I were invited and I should come. I fretted about how I would look in my bathing suit and we all left.

i was watching some video of some get-together that took place in a big concert hall type dealy and there was some band playing, and all the people in the audience were like, naked and fucking on the floor and covered in blood, and people were like, attacking each other and killing each other.... and in my dream i was like, really disgusted and thinking that that concert was waaaaaay more hardcore than i was comfortable with, that it resembled some sort of medieval depiction of hell, but that dimitri would probably be interested to see it.

i was having some sort of house party and my parents convinced me to have it in this two-story old house that keith owned apparently, like he had bought it and hadn't had a chance to fix it up yet but was planning on renting it out to people eventually. so i invited a bunch of friends and apparently somebody put a general invite up on fb coz like, hundreds of people i didn't know came. i hadn't been drinking but felt drunk, and i was looking for people i knew. mike and sten were around... then i found chris and he was with biz schaeffer and i was like, hey come with me. so i took him away and idk i guess we were wandering around and i showed him the house and stuff and then he started running around in circles in the yard around and around the house and i was like wtf are you doing? so i convinced him to stop and keith travis was there... and some girl, dammit i forget who. someone from high school. and she had been trying to lay on somebody's arm but thought it was too bony? so she lay down with her head on his arm or leg or something and chris and i lay down on the ground too and we were all talking. then i decided to text Lindsay and tell her that she should come to see some movie with me the next day (apparently coming from portland for one day isn't a big deal ;P) i couldn't manage to text her though, couldn't figure out how to spell the words out. i eventually gave up. i got up and walked around and found dimitri on the porch, and he didn't really look like himself. i didn't recognize him at first. he and i were chatting and i told him i wanted to see "that movie" tomorrow and he was like "what movie?" and i said "NOT cloudy with a chance of meatballs!" then we saw some art on the walls... it was all golden and shiny and i guessed that keith had bought it to decorate the house. i asked dimitri who else was there that we knew and he said kat and david, and that they had come with mike and sten. i was like...huh... i saw mike and sten much earlier and i didn't see kat and david!
eventually keith came there and was pissed about something but i think he calmed down. then he wanted dimitri to talk to the kids or something? so i went through the house calling his name and finally found him and then he, keith and i were walking to find the kids and dimitri was making all these smart-ass comments at keith's expense and i was all like, dimitri, you're so awesome! lol.

i was playing some sort of supermarket sweep-esque game in which you had to go to different areas of the store on a bike and find things that started with certain letters of the alphabet and put them in a basket. gregg was there, apparently playing with feli (from work). this was weird because the teams were supposed to consist of an adult and a preschooler, apparently. i think feli was the preschooler (despite the fact that she's a grown woman).
I was married to Dexter Morgan.

i went somewhere with some friends and then we were all going to a water park or something, some big place where you could swim and there were like, waterfalls but it seemed at least partially man-made. when we got there, i saw that chris was there already, and i was surprised because i hadn't known he was coming out. i remember thinking that it was cool that i hadn't been expecting him, and then he showed up and it was a nice surprise.
i went up to talk to him, and somehow we ended up kissing. and i was thinking, in the dream, that i was glad i'd given him the space and not kept harassing him, because it was paying off now and he felt safe to come to me etc etc.
then it gets hazy. we went to some treehouse that was presumably owned by my mom and there were four bedrooms, two of which were really rickety and one like, completely fell out of the tree while we were standing in the living room and i was like, damn i'm glad we weren't going to use that bedroom. that's really all i remember.

i was at some sort of outdoor venue with a bunch of friends and we were hanging out... then they all disappeared and i was like, chill at first and then started to wonder where they all went. i went looking for them and realized somebody new had come and they had all gone to wherever this new person preferred to be. sten was sitting there smoking (i mention this not because it was particularly relevant but because i remember her position clearly whereas everyone else is kind of fuzzy.) then we all went to some sort of museum, i think a modern art museum or something. we all lined up to get tickets but they ran out before i got to the window. everyone went on in without me, seemingly totally unconcerned. there was some sense that i had stalled in some way before and it was my fault that i didn't get in in time. you couldn't go in to see the exhibits without going through this guided tour for which you needed a ticket. i was really upset that i had been separated from everyone and sat down on a stair to pretend to text message so i wouldn't look like a total loser. then i got a text from somebody (i didn't know who) saying that there was a play going on in the lobby for those who hadn't been able to make the tour. i looked around and a group was forming on the floor to watch this play, which was put on by bard-esque art/theater students and which looked to be majorly pretentious. i picked out kat and david in the audience and surmised that she had been the one to text me. i was unsure about going over and sitting with them for some reason, hung back on the steps and watched the play, which sucked.
a masked Zachariah Smith threw black scooby doo pajamas at me.

some other people and me were squatting at some house that looked just like my parents' house. there was no heat so we were all wrapped up and wearing layers of clothing trying to sleep. i kept getting texts from keith's aunt about some job she was working at an overnight bakery that apparently employed strippers. they were having trouble with one of them or something.... i kept trying to sleep, had the kids with me i think. we ended up moving our blankets and stuff onto the porch. it was daylight outside but we were still trying to sleep. then a guy wearing a black mask came running over and threw something at us and i was scared until i realized it was zack and he'd thrown adult sized black scooby doo pajamas at us. then sandy showed up and was like, yelling at me for never talking to her and was like "Did you even find the plushie i left in your car???" as she said that, i remembered finding some weird stuffed thing on my driver's seat and throwing it to the side thinking it was from my mom.

there was a part where i had been hanging out with people and i was about to go home. we were all gathered in some sort of park that was located where the green is on the corner by the vassar alumni house, where they have the farmer's market. we were all hugging and i went to hug chris and then we like, sort of kissed or started to kiss but he like, burped or something lol. i was like "did you just burp on me?!" he backed up and was like "well... but i could have gone home with you." i was thinking oh shit now he's embarrassed and he's going to ignore me for another few months.
there was another part where i was at work and they had totally revamped the diner, made it fancy. the window wasn't right out in the open, the cooks worked out of the way, down a hallway. it was basically a typical "diner-mare" as christine calls them: there were too many people, i couldn't get their food fast enough and everyone was getting mad at me. it was really frustrating.
then i guess i was driving back from newburgh? (we ran into zack again somewhere but i forget the details...) i was driving and then forgot whether i was going north like i needed to or south. i was trying to figure out which direction the river was in when all of a sudden i was riding a bike on a cliff above the river. i guess i determined that i was going in the right direction but at that moment came upon some sort of lodge perched right on the cliff so that in order to continue along my path i had to go directly through it. somebody in the building called my name and i saw that this girl jess that i used to work with was in there, presumably working. the lodge had huge windows facing the river and a huge hot tub inside.

somehow, dimitri found out about a party being thrown by kelsey, and everyone was going to go. d was wearing the white suit that he wore to the rollerskating party, and gregg was dressed up too. i don't remember if anybody else was dressed up. we all drove over in separate cars, and it turned out that the house where the party was was actually amanda's house, but kelsey was there and nobody knew anything about a party. we stayed though, and all these other people showed up. my friends were all squeezed onto a couch, it was like sten mike kat gregg dimitri in that order, except that christina post was between gregg and dimitri.(who i'm not all that fond of, i mean i don't hate her but i feel very meh she's not worth my time about her). at first i was like oh shit there's not enough room! but everyone kind of moved over for me but then dimitri got up, presumably to make room for me but he ended up just going and sitting elsewhere on the couch, so i was next to christina post. i hit her hand by accident or something and i said i was sorry but she made a big deal out of it, which pissed me off so i got up and went to go do something else. went in the house... this part is hazy... inside was this bartender from coco's and he was topless and way fatter than he is in real life. and some people were going to go out in the forest to find some person a new home? we kinda did but i'm not sure how that was resolved... i walked around outside and eventually found this place where there was like a mini railroad with a small train and it was like a historical site, and it was surrounded by beautiful landscape and i wished i had remembered my camera. then we were all going to sleep over... and the next thing i knew i was waking up... not wearing pants but just a long t-shirt. talked to gregg, dimitri etc for a bit and then they left the room... i got caught up playing a video game or something and then when i came out, the owners of coco's (evil dimitri and nike) were there and nike scolded me for playing video games while evil dimitri said that he liked to play them and she was like, UGH whatever. then they were gone and i was trying to get in touch with people because nobody was there anymore. i wanted to know where they'd all gone and was trying to text people but finding that my phone was all fucked up, like i guess i had been drunk the night before and put some kind of "block" on my access to people's phone numbers in my phone. finally i got a text back from dimitri, who said that he and everybody else had gone somewhere else but that he didn't think that he and i should hang out for a while (he said something about it angering keith? or keith getting the 'wrong idea' or something idk). i was really upset but he was unrelenting in his resolve. and that was pretty much it.

i was having a party and there started to be some sort of weather crisis that drove everybody inside. then there was a lull in it and either evan or gregg or both insisted on going home and i was like, i don't think that's a good idea! there were a lot of people there for some reason that i barely knew and i didn't want the world to end with my good friends elsewhere. and i was afraid that it was going to be unsafe outside... that was the main reason i didn't want them to go, really. but anyway. eventually it got dark and the sky turned to red and blue puzzle pieces and they started crashing into each other like glass and literally falling from the sky. in the dream i was freaking out.

i met my own parents, years ago, and my 8-year-old self. they lived in some extremely snowy climate, and were trekking off somewhere during a blizzard. i had to strap my child-self into this really nice volvo and ride in the back seat with her. i was thinking how weird it was that me as a child was seeing me as an adult, and wondered if it would affect the "future" at all, having seen my future as a child.
the details are mostly really fuzzy but there was also a part where we were watching a movie and i was trying to shield child-me's eyes from whatever was going on. it was really incredibly gory. that's really all i remember. oh, and bar stools somewhere, at a breakfast counter in someone's house.

i followed evan down to nyc and got an apartment with people i didn't really want to live with... one was some older man who was apparently keith and ciara's father and had just recently found out but i didn't remember ever having sex with him. i told him not to expect anything romantic to happen and he said he understood. turned out that we shared our kitchen with a restaurant, and the people from the restaurant had to walk through our bathroom to get to the dining room out on a porch. instead of a door connecting the restaurant to our apartment, there was just a sheet hanging in the doorway, and there were open windows where people could see right into our bathroom. the shower stall was actually the frame from a bunkbed and didn't work, the shower was actually located out in the bathroom itself, and turned on automatically when you walked in, and soaked everything. the previous occupants of the apartment left five boomboxes and a playstation 2, which i was really excited about.
i was jumping in a bouncy house with nathan fillion

court was held in like this big room and there were two court cases being heard in the same room so it was really cacophonous and confusing. everybody involved had to sit at this long table with the judge at one end, and me and keith at the other, with our lawyers next to us. keith's lawyer walked in and was like "can't you find another suit?" i looked down and realized that i had like, TOTALLY not prepared... my hair wasn't done, i wasn't wearing makeup, i was wearing the suit i bought for this but with my converse with the purple laces, not with heels. i was like "will this be a problem?" and my lawyer, who was wearing a bill cosby-esque sweater, solemnly nodded his head "yes". then keith, who was wearing jeans and like, shiny dress shoes, stood up and climbed on the table and walked across it, where one of the other guys there pushed him and wouldn't let him down, and keith was like, what's the big deal? i just wanna get to the other side.

i was at barnes and noble with some people (not my friends around here. not sure who they were) and i saw evan sitting in the corner at one of the little tables by the area where you put milk and stuff in your coffee. he hadn't even told me he was coming to poughkeepsie though, so i didn't know if i should go over and say hi. i didn't, just sat there talking and trying to play it cool, like i hadn't noticed him there. so eventually he noticed me and came over and we talked.

kristen drove me to work in a red sports car and she was a very reckless driver. she dropped me off in a place i wasn't accustomed to being dropped off... it was near a giant hello kitty store and a party store (neither of which actually exist in new paltz). i was trying to find the diner but couldn't. ended up walking through a mall where they were conducting some kind of class for little kids and someone asked if i was going to be the instructor and the real instructor said that in japan, they don't do it like that. i then walked through a school... all around, looked at the time and was like holy shit i'm gonna be late! i was really lost though.
then i guess i was at what was my parents' house sleeping, and my alarm went off but i turned it off thinking that i didn't really need it to get up in time for work. then i woke up and saw that it was like 9:30 and i was supposed to be at work at 9:30(am). i tried calling memo to tell him that i would be late but he didn't pick up. i was freaking out... i think my mom brought me to work this time? and the diner was like,, on top of what i guess was bob's house? and when i got there, juan and carlos were throwing some kids out who had stolen something from an old lady. it was chaotic... i went inside and was in a living room where it looked like he was having a party. i assumed it was for easter. i asked memo, who was there, if the diner was open and he was like "yes, of course." i apologized for being late. he said that it was really dead anyway so i could just go home.
there was some other portion of my dream that i guess doesn't really make sense with the rest of it but there were two groups of people, one on each side... maybe the other side was like canada or something or the us army? anyway lupe, feli's boyfriend was there and he threw like a molotov cocktail at them and they started shooting and everyone was shooting at each other and there were tanks and bombs and shit. and then there were like, kids watching it and like in a tv show the scene turned into a painting kind of thing?
there was also a part where my parents had gotten a huge, in-ground pool and i was all excited... then i looked out their window again and saw that it wasn't in fact a pool but a huge, muddy ditch.
all my teeth fell out, but this time they didn't crumble, like they used to do. they popped out, one by one, like kernels of corn off the cob.

the sky was falling, as is the custom in my world-ending dreams. there were meteors falling everywhere, about the size of a car i guess, smashing into everything. people were sitting outside watching and i was like wtf are you guys crazy?! i ran indoors, into some big building with multiple floors. the meteors were pummeling the side of the building, smashing windows etc. i hid in the basement....
there was also a part where i was presumably still in that building and i had chloe with me. i had some kind of medical ailment and was in some sort of hot tub or whirlpool. i had red rings around my lower legs where my socks had cut into my skin, and a woman was telling me that this was evidence of whatever sickness i supposedly had.

i went on a date with kevin, who turned out to be a total asshole. he wanted to play twister, but i wanted to play some other board game. he sneered at me, saying that *everyone knows* twister is the best game.
and last night, i had a dream that i was going to the book club. last night before bed, i had talked to dimitri on the phone about the next book club selection, and then afterward he told me that they had rescheduled the next meeting so that i could come. :) anyway, in the dream, i came, but late, because i had been working. they were all sitting around a large dinner table in an unfamiliar place. when i went in, dimitri looked at me disapprovingly for being late. i sat next to him and we like... held hands. then i was like, wait a second, i'm not supposed to hold hands with dimitri! and was really embarrassed, but he didn't seem phased by it, so i was just kind of like *shrug, ok* and kept doing it. Haha!

i was riding on one of those bouncy horse things that they have at playgrounds, except it wasn't connected to the ground; i was riding it through the streets of a city. i decided to be a hot-shot and jump a fallen tree with it. i managed to pull it off, and as i landed on the other side, a group of construction workers applauded and the tree itself cheered and congratulated me on my athletic prowess. i dismounted, was wearing a fancy black dress and heels and was with kevin, who was wearing a suit. we went into a woman's clothing store, where a woman was looking at a metallic multi-colored dress. i think she was considering it for her wedding dress. her mother, who was with her, disapproved, but the daughter assured her that it would be beautiful once bleached. kevin teased me about when we met, kept calling me something like "that silly waitress" and i sheepishly apologized for following him around all night (which didn't actually happen, for the record). he reacted basically like "psh, whatever." we were sort of in a restaurant now, and kevin said that he was going to go to a different restaurant and get me ice cream. i sat and waited, attempting to read a book that he'd left behind. when i first woke up the memory of the dream was so vivid that i could almost recall the words on the page, but i've lost that detail now. there was an overweight woman sitting across from me smearing lotion on her exposed chest.

my dream last night involved a duplicate of my laptop, dimitri giving me a brand new car (haha), sleeping through work, and putting my kids on a train to grand central for some reason and then freaking out and trying to figure out how to get them back.
evan was starring in a production of "fiddler on the roof" as weird al playing yakov smirnoff. (like, he was pretending to be weird al pretending to be yakov smirnoff.) he was really excited.

i was touring some spot that was going to potentially be used for some reality show. as we went down in the basement, the woman in front of me made a joke that we were going to see if it needed to be made worse in order to "mimick jesse james's garage". we all laughed. later, i told somebody else that they had made the basement almost too bad, because the stairs were slippery. when we got down there, we were in a large cave-like room, where we were going to do yoga. most of the room was covered in shallow water, but one corner was dry and had a large bright opening in the wall. that area was supposed to be picturesque (and was.) then all of a sudden the water was very deep, and we climbed up on a rock on the other side with a bunch of other people. below, a fish as big as a whale jumped and snapped at us. we were instructed to inch closer to the edge and look down at it, as a sort of exercise in trust. we were going to do yoga in the water later, somehow. then this turned into some sort of "olympics" in which we were doing various athletic activities... whatever my event was was the easiest. there was a blonde boy with feathered hair who kept telling people to stop what they were doing, or to not tell the judges when they had completed a task. i got in his face and told him that he was being overbearing. he had no idea what i was talking about and looked at me quizzically.
new paltz was the fur-trapping center of the western world, and the buildings were all draped in hides and furs.

my mom told me she was @ Gregg's house and saw Evan laying on the bed with some girl. I said "well that doesn't necessarily mean anything" but I knew it really did. Oh! In another part I was in a class or something with what I eventually realized was that girl Angela who he was interested in back in October. She was really really young though in my dream, like 17 I think.

I was in my parents' neighborhood and found "our" cat (who stayed with Keith), Diego, but he was all ratty looking and dirty and skinny and seemed sick and was making crying noises. I picked him up and brought him home and lamented that he was so ill-treated that he had walked all the way from Poughkeepsie to my parents' house in Hyde Park to find me.
Then I was on my parents' porch, and a police chopper touched down in the yard, and I started freaking out thinking they were there to take me away for some crime I had committed unknowingly, but they just started handing out surveys. Half of the survey was already filled out. It asked if I had all these different affiliations, none of which I can remember except for Planned Parenthood. I was confused by the lack of information the surveys seemed to provide. I wondered why they bothered to come in a chopper to personally deliver these surveys that were so lacking in information.
Then I had to go and get cat food. My parents, although they don't have a dog, had like four HUGE bags of dog food, but no cat food. So I said I'd run "around the corner" to 7-11 (which isn't around the corner from my parents' house; It's around the corner from Keith's house.) My mom asked me to bring Chloe with me, but then for some reason I didn't and just went alone.
When I got back, I guess I had gone to the grocery store and did a full shopping trip, because I had like 10 bags of groceries. I put them down on the porch and walked in. The door was ajar and as I stepped into the house, I realized that my mom, the kids, and everyone else (there were all these other random kids in the house) were missing. I started panicking. In the dream I assumed they'd been kidnapped or hurt, not that they'd willingly gone somewhere.

I was at some expensive hippie-dippy new-agey cafe in some place like Woodstock or Tivoli or something, and I ordered some sort of fruity alcoholic beverage and a piece of banana bread. I wasn't sure I believed the sign at first and asked the lady whether it was actually banana bread, to make sure. She affirmed that it was.
I went and sat down outside on the patio and was eating, then I got up to do something, and when I came back, the banana bread was gone. Someone had thrown it out. I was mad because the banana bread was really overpriced and I was out of money and hungry.

Jp and I were observing some sort of "make your own nursing home" kit, and JP said (I guess this was a joke?) "Yeah! Or you could film an episode of The State on it!" I looked at him with that WTF look I feel I give him all the time and said: "Watch it, buddy!"

a big hunk of my hair fell out, and I kept staring at it in disbelief. I was horrified that I was losing my hair, but at the same time marveled at how gorgeous and well-kept the chunk appeared. It looked like one of those swatches of fake hair they have attached to the displays of hair dye.
In the same dream, I was cleaning out my ear with a q-tip, and when I pulled it out, it was covered in blood.

I was going to Oneonta (I've never been there; JP was talking about it before bed last night). In my dream, New York was separated into what was basically provinces, one of which was called "Oregon," where Oneonta was the capital. I was looking at a satellite view of "Oregon" trying to determine where Oneonta was, but I just couldn't find it. The area was really sparsely populated, the only discernible landmarks being a large lake with a smaller, crystalline man-made lake contained within it and a castle.
Next, I was picking along in vain, looking for something in the mud. It was raining. A Bollywood song was playing, the English lyrics repeating over and over: "My husband is dead." I found two bracelets in the mud, both identical, and I couldn't remember making the second one, but thought I'd made both. I also recovered a golden picture of me as a saint, and went back to whatever building I came from. "This is why I feel almost orgasmic about the first snow," I said in a sort of voice-over. Inside was my mother and Levi Butcher, who were crying. It was snowing outside and I could see other people out in the distance. "Where is everyone?!" I asked frantically, but they wouldn't tell me.

I was in a store and the nazi guy from Raiders of the Lost Ark came in to rob it. With him were what I assume were Nazi robots with tiny machine guns in their eyes. After he got the money he asked for, he directed the robots to shoot around the room. Somehow by crouching in the corner, I avoided being shot, but then I think may have gotten shot anyway? I'm not entirely sure.
I was arrested for knocking over a golden portrait of Elvis.
Dreamed of a zombie apocalypse. Details are fuzzy, but leopard-print clogs were involved.
Taco Bell
joan of arc, but she had a pirate name.

I moved in with J.p. Ward and he brought home a tiny grizzly bear, which he scienced into a full-sized grizzly and wanted to keep for a pet, and I found a tiny Rachael Saltzman living in the wall.  then i saw jp in a diner like, looking for treasure in the seats of a table that was coverd in crumbs and a plaid cabby hat. and i think we were living in syracuse, and i went to like the syracuse university student center, but it didn't look like it actually looks, t was huge and glass walled and uhh, i got lost in it. and was running around confused ... i think it was a conglomeration of the "underground" shopping area by rockefeller center and the hospital that my dad was just in.
I was a grave robber in ancient Egypt, but the grave-robbing was kinda government sanctioned and required the completion of an obstacle course in order to get to the goods.

It was one of my kids' birthday and we were having a family birthday party, but the party was planned and put on by Angela. I was totally pushed out of the process and was feeling really downtrodden and unimportant. I started getting angry and yelled at her, saying basically that they were MY kids, I fucking raised them, she didn't have her own and why does she have any right to be the one to organize this? Why would she know better than me what to do with them? I woke up with my jaw aching from clenching my teeth so hard.

JD was in my dream last night, and he made a big construction paper penguin--It was like 3 ft tall, as a wall decoration, and he got some kind of award for it. He was also driving a big white van and Gregg was in it with him, and there were cardboard boxes dropping out of the bottom, and I was finding them on the ground and wondering if he knew he had lost them.
Dimitri and I were watching a bridge be partially disassembled (it had had two legs, one was being removed.) We wondered how it would stay up, now only being supported on one side.

Sten had a fluffy white cat that she had to get rid of because Robbie Bear had a cat with a similar name and he was not ok with this for whatever reason. She chose me because I claimed to be ok with diet coke (when in reality I hate the stuff.) I took the cat home and it didn't get along with Lydia.... I thought about putting it outside, but was afraid that i would lose it in the snow, it being white and all.

I went on a field trip to a museum that had, among other things, a display of "Star Wars" desks with built-in pianos and typewriters (yeah, typewriters...idk.) and  Jason Cintron was there writing a letter to Beverly Cleary telling her that she should use my name in a book.

I went to a church in a high school gymnasium with my mom and children, where people were worshiping what appeared to be a dead woman on a table, surrounded by candles. I was weirded out at first until my mom told me that it was the black madonna, and it was ok for me to touch her. I did, touched her hand, and realized she wasn't actually a human body but more, structurally, like a mannequin.
I can't really accurately describe the feeling I got when I touched her but it was odd. I found the dream interesting because of the presence of something that is considered kind of universally significant. The black madonna is what Rasputin saw in the sky which led him to the historically significant portion of his life. She is seen to symbolize the more powerful, potent side of feminity. She's the badass, sexy Virgin Mary. But she's also not something I've ever really thought about all that much. I looked it up when I was reading about Rasputin, but it was a fleeting interest, and it was like 2 years ago, so it was weird to have her pop up in my dream now like that.
I worked with Kat and she and Tom henry were having a baby.
I was late for work because I was eating a really juicy grapefruit in the parking lot.
I was playing a game called "Hello Kitty's Pregnancy Care” on ATARI.
Had kind of a stressful relationship dream last night, and Stephen hawking was there, observing my drama over a beer.

Frank Kerschbaumer's band made it big. I found their CDs in a store. IN SPACE. (I was on some space station or something...) and I took pictures with my phone to send to JP. The CDs were put in the "country" section by whoever arranged the merchandise, because Frank lives in NC.
I was still working in Danbury and was late for my shift. I had to ride there on a child's bike with a hand-painted lute on my back.
Skyrim dragons.
somebody wanted to buy a birdhouse as a Christmas gift. With great glee, I told them that there is a man in Rhinebeck selling them from his yard.

2 nights in a row I dreamed about work: in 1 dream, everyone else in the store was making glittery Christmas decorations in the back without me and leaving me to deal with the customers. In the other, the store was located on a sinking ship filled with penguins and I had an iPad stolen by a group of unruly teenagers. Very stressful! lol. And the worst thing about dreaming about work is that then you have to get up and go to work "again".

I went to the most inefficient, poorly-run McDonald's ever. It was in a cave at the top of a mountain. I had to wait FOREVER. When they finally served me, they gave me a giant tray of enchiladas instead of the bacon egg and cheese I asked for. When I told them I wanted it to-go, they just threw a napkin over it. Oh, and they forgot my coffee! Lol.
somehow by creating Halo games, humanity caused a real live covenant to attack us. Jp and I and a rag-tag group of survivors were trying to escape Albany and it was TERRIBLE.
I somehow had neglected to quit my job at the diner back in 2010, was still working there (much to my confusion) and was late for work.

In a parallel universe,I accidentally killed three people. While I was trying to hide the bodies, the police came, but to arrest me for a different crime (I had moved a man's car without his permission.) as I packed my stuff for prison (hideous, flimsy dresses and a Care Bears VHS tape) in a child-sized suitcase, the cop was wandering around. Afraid he'd find the bodies, I tried to rush.... Woke up as I was dream-texting Jp to tell him I was going to prison in another dimension.
I was dragging Jp to a mindfulness meditation group but when we got there I realized (to my disappointment) that the people inside were actually doing bikram yoga.
My brother wrote a coffee table book about luaus.
I tried to give Jp an old AP magazine with Trent Reznor on the cover, but he was uninterested.

Amanda and I were at a picnic in Tivoli, where I loaded my plate up with barbecue and baked beans. She convinced me to leave our food temporarily to go to an aquarium and watch whales. When we got back to the picnic, they’d cleared away all the dinner food and brought out cakes. I was unhappy that I had wasted my time looking at whales when I could have been eating beans. I did not want cake.

I was in Syracuse, staying in a dorm room with giant, glassless windows high in a tower. A terrifying storm hit. I was cowering in the dark room, when a belligerent giraffe stuck his head through my window and started nosing around threateningly.
I had a typewriter somehow filled with the bones of chicken wings.

For the last last two nights, I've had these connected dreams that take place in some bizarre-o coastal vacation town, where Gregg Olheiser and Jill LiXonline own a boardwalk Italian restaurant that gets inundated at high tide (and where I lose my cell phone in said high tide,) and  Slash from Guns n' Roses runs a tattoo studio (where Christine Houlihan and Paul Sandiford want to get matching tattoos.) Very involved, lonnnnggg dream.
I was having a party with Bill Cosby.
I went to a pool party hosted by Neil Gaiman and David Bowie.
Ray Romano dropped a giant kernel of popcorn out a window and it was sucked into a black hole.

a man attacked me. I reacted in self-defense and stabbed him, then went on with my life thinking it was excusable.
After the fact, a stranger in an online forum told me that I would most likely be getting "fifteen years to life," for my reaction, because I'd gone too far. I'd not only stabbed him, I'd stabbed him 64 times. In the buttocks. Until he died. And then kept stabbing him.
I was chasing mice and woke myself up twitching as I "caught" them
it was during WWII, and I belonged to a contingent of vampires fighting for the allies.

My dad appeared to my mom and me. Jp was there, but couldn't see him. I can't remember what my dad said, but he looked happy, like he does in the photos from the 80s, and the way I remember him when I was little. His hair was black, and he was smiling. In the dream, I was relieved that my mom could see him too, because that meant I wasn't crazy.

Jp and I had a vicious fight over whether Javascript was a "real" programming language or not. In my dream, he told me that he had learned Assembly and C in middle school, and Javascript was basically for idiots.

Jp and I went to Japan. I was looking for my host family, and found their house. (It didn’t look like it actually looked.) Had a hard time finding somewhere to park - what we thought was handicapped parking was just a sign saying to use the e-brake because the driveway was steep. So we parked, but Jp was afraid to go up to the door. I was too because I didn’t know if they would remember me or want me there, but I felt like one of us had to be brave, so I knocked. My host mother opened the door and didn’t seem to recognize me at first, so I took my glasses off. I was trying to talk to them (poorly) in Japanese and tell them I was sorry for not writing, but here I am and is that ok? My host father was sitting inside on a recliner, answered in almost perfect English. I wondered how he’d learned to speak English so well.

Nelson from work sent me a message and said he was overwhelmed by stress and the demands and drama of the people in the community, and that the other night, when nobody showed up for meditation, was the worst night of his life.

I was at the condos looking for Christine but couldn’t remember where hers was. Someone approached me to see if I needed directions. I said no and was annoyed at her intrusion and embarrassed. She said if I found Christine’s condo, I’d better knock on the door. If I didn’t, it would be really weird and creepy. The condos weren’t the condos though. They were a dark apartment complex with twisty stairs. I thought Christine must be on the 3rd floor.

I kidnapped Feli and brought her to Honduras. She and I were sitting in a cafe and she spoke no English. I was trying to explain to her where I had brought her by drawing maps, but as I drew the outline of the US, I realized I didn’t know where Honduras was, so I looked it up on my phone. When she realized where we were and that they would speak Spanish, she started yelling in Spanish. Everyone ignored her and I worried that she wouldn’t believe me that we were in Honduras, and think we were in some other non-Spanish speaking country.

My dad hadn’t really died - he did, almost, and we thought he was gone, but he came back somehow. My mom got mad at him though for something and kicked him out. We weren’t sure where he went. I was mad at her for losing him again when we’d gotten a second chance. I thought I wanted to talk to him, to say I was sorry for not reaching out more, but realized he wouldn’t be receptive anyway, because he never was. But I still wanted him to come back.
My mom said she would bring me Chinese food but then she was gone for like 4 hours and I started to worry. I called her, and it turned out she had just gone to bed.
Somebody slipped lemon doTerra oil in my soda and I almost didn’t notice. The glass fell over and spilled and I was relieved that I now wouldn’t need to drink it.

Amanda and I were trying to escape some place. To escape, we had to go through this sort of maze of man-made caves. It was dark, and we had to make sure we didn’t misstep. Some places had high drop-offs. There seemed to be people outside somewhere looking for us.
Eventually, we found a way out. There was a sign or something that said to look out for people who had escaped a mental institution, and all these big like, McMansion-style houses. We tried to run and escape completely, but were apprehended. It seemed that the people who caught us were in control of the situation the whole time and were just waiting for us out there. It also seemed that the whole thing was maybe just a game, but it was so scary, it felt real.
I kept forgetting to turn on my wifi and kept inadvertently ending up on data. I got a bill for $9,000 from AT&T.

I ordered a sound system, the one recommended by Kevin Walsh, for the library. After I did, everyone was like why did you order this extravagant system? These other libraries get by with a little boombox like this. And they showed me the boombox and I was unable to explain why we needed the more expensive system.
Penny had kittens. They looked like little mini-Pennies. She was hiding them in the couch.

We bought our house but it was in Hyde Park, not in Tivoli, and the circumstances were different. Had been repossessed or something from some old lady. And there was something broken and a guy said he could fix it, but he wouldn’t, because he didn’t feel right about how we had acquired it. We realized we’d bitten off more than we could chew. The previous owner was still coming to the house too, in and out, and we felt too bad to tell her not to.
Jp and I were in some sort of polyamorous relationship with a demon who had learned everything he knew about humanity from gangster movies.

I thought Jp was dying. He went away and I assumed after a while that he had gone somewhere to die. But then he came back and he’d just been at a karate tournament. He was really short and didn’t seem particularly interested in resuming our relationship. We worked at a restaurant and there were several other people there who were all interested in a relationship with him, and it wasn’t clear that he would choose me (or anyone for that matter.)

I was hanging around with some kid and these teenagers were bullying him and calling him “Hollywood”, implying that he acted pretentious and/or too “extra”. I was upset that they were so mean and went with the boy to some room. We had knives and I thought we could defend ourselves if someone attacked, but also I worried that I had put his life in danger by getting involved. A teenage girl came down with blood on her hands, saying she was injured. I knew she was faking though and that she had a knife, and would stab me if I got too close to her. So I kicked her. (I woke myself up actually kicking.)

I had a baby I had somehow kept alive though I wasn’t sure how, because I kept forgetting I had him. Evan came to visit and he had written a book everyone was oohing and aahing over. I wondered whether I had had any impact on his life and felt jealous of his success and how easily he had been able to discard me back in the day. I saw the book, of which I thought he was “just” the author, but it turned out that he was the illustrator as well. I looked at the back of the book and it was about two characters, one with my name, and the other named enomenasuolaez (my gamer tag spelled backwards.) Except they were two sides of the same person, and had to find a way to integrate both sides and become one. I realized that I had obviously influenced the book and felt a little bit less like a completely lame loser.
Evan had a blog/vlog that everyone thought was hilarious, but then I realized that all of his material was actually written by Alyssa Church.

I was in the back of a van/train going across state lines somewhere with a bunch of people from high school and/or college. We had to have some sort of documentation to go to the next state, involving some sort of numeric code that was written on scraps of paper that were scattered all over the floor of the van. I was worried that I wouldn’t be able to find mine. Nobody else seemed concerned.
Sandy (Mort) wrote a poem on Facebook about how and why she loves Lularoe and made it public “for personal reasons” to show the haters (me) that they were being unfair and hurting her.

I had been with Jp but he had left me. I had a hard time remembering who he was or how to find him, but only knew that I had found somebody I felt completely comfortable with, and now I couldn’t find him again. I tried dating other people from my past (e.g. Evan) but none of it felt right.

I was at a mall carrying Keith around like a baby, even though he’s 15. I realized someone should say I shouldn’t be, and that I shouldn’t have him if I was going to baby him. But he seemed so helpless.
I saw Sarah Huckabee Sanders with no makeup on and was like, hey, she looks much better without makeup.
